comment.text: @slaanesh, could you do a new build of recent remmina? The current version (1.2.32.1) is affected by this file corruption bug: https://github.com/FreeRDP/FreeRDP/issues/5185

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
Remmina crashed with core dump when trying to RDP a windows host via SSH Tunel


Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): 1.2.31.3 


Additional info - logs:
